website_summaries.verdict: The Zoe olive oil is the perfect balance of quality and value.
pros: Zoe olive oil is a lovely golden color with a slight green tint
The flavor is powerful, with hints of pepper and fruit
The oil makes an excellent salad dressing or bread dip
You can also use this oil in a marinade for meat
The tin packaging is aesthetically pleasing
The tin helps keep light out, which will increase the oil's shelf life
The tin also has a pop-out spout that makes for easy, mess-free pouring
cons: The pop-out spout is difficult to pop out, but works well afterward

customer_reviews.title: I Found My "Go To" Olive Oil
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an expert on olive oil, and I wasn't having much success finding an EVOO that I liked...until now. I tried a lot of big brand names and I couldn't find one that had the flavor I was looking for. Even the highly regarded domestic oil didn't impress me. I wanted a great oil for dressings and dipping. From the first taste I realized Zoe's a high quality oil. It's robust and delicious. There are all kind of notes people attribute to it such as, "fruity", "peppery", sure, it has all that. I just know that when I dipped a piece of bread in it I couldn't stop eating it. I found what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: jenesaiquoi

customer_reviews.title: Fruity and pungent and a little bitter and a new favorite
customer_reviews.text: I am Italian and I typically use Italian olive oils or some of the nicer Californian ones. I think this oil is great. If you are used to an olive oil that is very buttery or nutty or mild then the slight bitterness and bite this oil has might turn you off but I love its flavor profile and so did everyone I know who has tried it. It’s nice to have a variety of different olive oils that you can go to for different flavors and this one is definitely going into my arsenal. Also, this is a great price for this quality of oil.
customer_reviews.author: BohdiTree

customer_reviews.title: Awesome olive oil but expensive
customer_reviews.text: I am Spanish and it is hard for me to find an olive oil that I like and that is comparable to the wonderful olive oil that we produce in my country. I really like this olive oil. It is of great quality and taste, and of course, the best part is that it is Spanish. It has the right thickness, color, and taste. The packaging is perfect, cool designed, easy to store, and recyclable. My only problem with it is the price. I wish it was comparable to the prices that I pay in Spain. However, as an ex-pat and a person that loves cooking and loves good olive oil, I would definitely recommend this high-quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R

customer_reviews.title: 75% of advertised quantity
customer_reviews.text: The description says 2 x 1l cans, actually received 2 x 750ml cans. Box is labeled 2x750ml. Packing order says 2x1l. Seems like someone would have noticed that and fixed the listing, 3 stars is just for that- 25% off its actual rating for 25% less oil than advertised seems fair. The oil itself is used as everyday eggs oil, primarily. Really, I'm not an oil connoisseur. It's not exceptional, but also not bad in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: Light and fresh, tasty and delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Whoa, I really like the taste of this! I usually get mine from Trader Joes, and only ordered this to fill my Pantry box. I'm so glad I got it! The reviews are right, this stuff tastes good! It's a gorgeous golden color with green tint, and is perfect for caprese salads, and pretty much on any salad or steamed veggie. It's obviously very high quality; those Spaniards really know a thing or two about first cold presses. Helpful? Click to tell me/Amazon! ;-D
customer_reviews.author: MoJo Dono

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising!!!
customer_reviews.text: First & foremost Amazon was great! They refunded my money. However the product/oil is falsely advertised! The description states that it’s from Spain. To my surprise when I received the three cans they were ALL made in a Portugal?!?!? Olive oil consumers and fans know countries of origin for olive oils! Especially Mediterranean people! Personally assuming customers wouldn’t notice is quite insulting to me. Frankly I believe it’s a scam that the manufacturer probably thinks people won’t mind or notice. Believe me, I have absolutely nothing against Portugal but you must advertise correctly in commerce! Do not put your trust in this manufacturer! Not worth the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: ZG

customer_reviews.title: Great - but not from Spain!
customer_reviews.text: The oil itself is great, and at this price point in the US, it's a fantastic deal. The presentation is impeccable and the can should preserve the oil better than any plastic bottle (I hope it does not develop a metallic aftertaste, though!) My biggest problem is with false advertising. Everywhere on the page as well as in the product photos, it says it's a Product of Spain. However, in the cans I received, it clearly says "Packed in Spain. Product of Portugal", and the Olive Oil from Spain logo is not there anymore. Please update the product description and images to match the real product!
customer_reviews.author: Javier Agüera

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these a few weeks ago after accidentally dropping my full olive oil to the ground. Glass and olive oil everywhere! This was one of the Olive Oil's that would deliver the soonest BUT its also in a can, so less likely its going to shatter into a million pieces. The area where we keep our oils is pretty difficult to reach so accidents aren't entirely unlikely. My husband was skeptical that this would taste good because its in a can...but I think it tastes great! There is a little spillage that occurs but its not a huge deal. This is a great value for sure!
customer_reviews.author: jennys

customer_reviews.title: I LOVEEEEEEEE this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have NEVER ever gone crazy like this for an olive oil!! It's just perfectly delicious.... I want to drink it straight from the can lol I love the can too...Feels old school..Olive oil that is REAL does taste much more strong and pungent than the fake stuff...You can Google olive oil scam lists to see the real stuff..Many of the major brands are not REAL!!!!..After much searching and reading this is the real deal..Don't be put off by it being strong tasting..... That's a really good thing!! ... mmm mmmm
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Bartholomew

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy packaging and great flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent flavor and sturdy packaging. Have purchased several times because it’s such a good find and cheaper than other places.
customer_reviews.author: Rey Co Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Was rancid. Must have been stored improperly. Even replacement order was rancid.
customer_reviews.author: Tubular

customer_reviews.title: Best Olive Oil
customer_reviews.text: I have searched for an olive oil with real flavor for years and I now have found it! This is the oil you want for non-cooking applications like vinaigrette, dipping, and drizzling. You can use it for cooking, but keep the heat low to retain all the flavor and health benefits. The flavor is buttery, sweet and mild, but distinctly olive-y. The price is very reasonable and so much better than anything you can get locally...unless you live in Greece. Buy some!
customer_reviews.author: RLR

customer_reviews.title: THE ONLY EXTRA VIRGIN OLIVE OIL I PURCHASE!!
customer_reviews.text: There is not a better tasting Olive Oil than Zoe Spanish Extra Virgin Olive Oil! If you haven’t cooked with this Product of Spain you don’t know what you’re missing!! It’s the ONLY Extra Virgin Olive Oil I will ever purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rima Duhon

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Tin Container
customer_reviews.text: Olive oil is very good, tastes is excellent, good price, and I have bought 3 or 4 times. Unfortunately at this time one of the 2 tins was damaged (see pictures). The cardboard shipping box was fine so it wasn't during shipping that it got damaged. I still recommend as a good product and will still buy more when I am through it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and versatile!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality and versatile olive oil for a super reasonable price. Replacing the nuttiness of Italian olive oil with a fruity flavor means there's nothing it doesn't go with. It's still great for cooking and dipping bread but it goes even better with salads and I can even put a bit into a breakfast smoothie without it becoming completely vile. I'm addicted to this olive oil and make sure I always have a stock around in the house.
customer_reviews.author: lo_dash

customer_reviews.title: The best olive oil to buy!
customer_reviews.text: Received in perfect condition, not a dent in the tin. Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: elaine w.

customer_reviews.title: Must have gotten a bad batch... AWFUL stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Yak! This was awful, but didn't discover until a month later and can't return. Worst tasting stuff ever... horribly bitter. Other reviews say it's great, so I'm wondering if I just got a bad batch, but you don't get another chance with me once I get a rotten product... sorry. Going back to my old brand and hoping y'all have better luck.
customer_reviews.author: Clementine

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Receive 1 Liter Cans!
customer_reviews.text: The description says that you get 2 each of 1 liter containers, but I received 2 each of .75 liter containers. I'm missing 25% of what was promised. I consider that as false advertising. I'm very unhappy with what I receive and am going to cancel my subscription immediately.
customer_reviews.author: D. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good price for what you get. Very good tasting olive oil, light and fruity.
customer_reviews.text: Good price for what you get. Very good tasting olive oil, light and fruity. I keep my olive oil in the fridge and refill a cruet so that's the only thing that becomes room temperature (which is best for olive oil). The colder olive oil thickens up so is easy to smear on toast in place of butter. And it keeps it fresher longer.
customer_reviews.author: mcadwellTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Nothing amazing
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special, and to be honest this was somewhat of a lack luster olive oil. The flavor was very mellow, and lacked any exciting characteristics that I like in a good olive oil. Id say its decent for cooking but not for consuming on its own. I have purchased Terra Creta from amazon and that olive oil is exceptional. I almost thought it was an olive/canola oil blend when I first tasted it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I travel to Europe each year and have sampled many oils. The best I have tasted is in a little village called Alatoz in Spain. I can’t bring that oil to the US. This oil is the next best oil and is almost as tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Bobble Head

customer_reviews.title: Love the packaging and color
customer_reviews.text: First thing that came to mind is the packaging. Metal instead of glass or plastic. We have limited recycling opportunities here and the metal works for our area in recycling. So we gave this a try and needless to say we are staying with this brand. The oil itself is of good color and aroma. OK to dip the french bread. Glad we found it.
customer_reviews.author: Skidevil

customer_reviews.title: Crushed cans and one with a hole in it
customer_reviews.text: My two can are in very poor condition. Both were very badly dented with one being completely crushed with a hole in it and oil leaking from it. I am very disappointed with one can having a hole in it and the other can being badly dented. Do not purchase unless you want crushed cans.
customer_reviews.author: Jake N.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite olive oil
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this olive oil and this brand is my favorite because I prefer having my oil in a dark bottle or can. The can is easy for me to travel with and I don't have to worry about the glass breaking in my bag. It has an awesome flavor and I really like the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bree6900

customer_reviews.title: Not for us
customer_reviews.text: The price is good, but the taste is off. We cook with a lot of olive oil and no longer live very near Trader Joe's. This has a fruity and plastic-y taste that we can't get past. It's fine for cooking, but we're not using it for salad dressings because of the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M

customer_reviews.title: It's not as tasteless as some might like (ie it's quality olive oil and it does have ...
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous olive oil. It's not as tasteless as some might like (ie it's quality olive oil and it does have flavor), but it is a great all-purpose olive oil; I used mine mainly for cooking and for salads. I could probably get away with something cheaper for cooking, but who wants 10 different types of olive oil? This one is excellent and provides wonderful flavor to your dishes and salads!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Whole family loves this
customer_reviews.text: I probably would prefer an organic olive oil, and there is an organic version of this one, if you want it. The taste, regardless, is great, and I can't believe I have already used up one of the two I have recently purchased. The whole family loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Product does not meet description!
customer_reviews.text: It’s advertised as “product of Spain” and from my past experience it has been. I was a fan of ZOE. But the recent order I received became “product of Portugal”. The untruthful substitution is unacceptable. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Meow

customer_reviews.title: My wife says this is good stuff, and I believe he :)
customer_reviews.text: My wife is second generation Polish/Hungarian and was taught to cook by her grandmother and her mother. This is her day to day, go to, oil of choice. She uses more expensive variety for her balsamic vinegar / olive oil crusty bread dips and salad dressings, but for an everyday heart healthy cooking oil, this is the one. It has a butteryer, ummm, butterier, hmmmm, lets just say more buttery flavor than most olive oils in this price range. She swears it is all olive oil (of course, so does the label) andunlike a lot of other (once again, at this price) oils advertised as virgin but adulterated with other oils.
customer_reviews.author: grumpyoldgeezer

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I love the flavor and value of this oil. I use a small squeeze bottle. It lasts a long time and doesn’t go rancid. I’m hooked!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Missing 500ml
customer_reviews.text: Well, I’m not sure about anyone else, but I’ve always understood that 1 liter is 1000ml and not 750ml. I purchased two 1 liter tins of oil (that’s what was advertised) and received two 750ml tins. This is a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Honey Badger

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous exterior and delicious interior
customer_reviews.text: Delicious. Smells so great but i was actually more impressed with the tin! It’s gorgeous haha. I usually pour my olive oil I to a dark bottle but love the way this tin looks so much that I didn’t!
customer_reviews.author: C.E.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great olive oil for the price
customer_reviews.text: We're now on our third order of this olive oil and love having it around the house. It has a pleasant flavor with a bit of fruit and spice that I would expect from a more expensive olive oil. Much more interesting than similarly-priced olive oils.
customer_reviews.author: FreakyBeat

customer_reviews.title: This is excellent olive oil but I gave it a 3 because ...
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent olive oil but I gave it a 3 because the last 2 times I ordered it, the expiration dates only allowed me to use it within 4 months. I love olive oil but I would have to drink it to use that much in that period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for price. Nice olive green color and flavor. About the package, it came with a dent one time because of packing and amazon sent one free. I buy 2, so they come in their own box now, nice and tight.
customer_reviews.author: In Brains we trust

customer_reviews.title: First Cold Pressed
customer_reviews.text: I was very pissed at Whole Foods when they dropped this brand! Idiots! I loved the 3L tin. Fortunately, I found Zoe again. Thank you 🙏🏻 Amazon. To my surprise, this 2L is a fabulous value.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality EVOO
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Nice bitter EVOO finish. Good buttery feel and taste.
customer_reviews.author: yobochef

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: It was very helpful to get this oil during beginning of corona lock down. I needed oil and it delivered. I was ready for any oil to cook. But I liked this brand and am going to order again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Milrud

customer_reviews.title: very pure and has been a very good buy
customer_reviews.text: I use olive oil a lot and was very upset to find that a lot of oils have add non olive oils so they are not pure olive oil. So I did lot of research to find the better true Extra Virgin olive oil. Zoe always showed up as one of the true pure olive oil. So I ordered it and I am very satisfied. It has helped with some health problems I had. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Oil For Low/No Heat!
customer_reviews.text: This oil has a rich and lovely flavor, especially if unheated or drizzled on cooked dishes just before serving. The BPA-free metal container is great for keeping out the light, so it has long shelf life. Plus, the price was right. Five stars :-)
customer_reviews.author: G. Simon

customer_reviews.title: Takes Me Back To Spain!
customer_reviews.text: My travels through Spain introduced me to this style of olive oil. Fresh and light. I love that I am able to bring the Spanish countryside into my home, especially in the winter!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thin olive oil
customer_reviews.text: This olive oil is very bitter not green in color as advertised and does not have the consistency of a true extra virgin olive oil. To make things worse you can not return it
customer_reviews.author: nico a

customer_reviews.title: Excellent everyday olive oil
customer_reviews.text: This is our house olive oil for cooking and salad dressings. It has a good taste, not overwhelming but smooth. We've purchased this several times now and have not seen any quality variation.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent reader

customer_reviews.title: Great for cooking with
customer_reviews.text: This is great for cooking with and making dressings. I like these smaller tins for keeping freshness. The spout is a little weird but it works.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price.
customer_reviews.text: I love this Olive oil because it’s organic and good price per ounce.
customer_reviews.author: Scooby Doo

customer_reviews.title: Best olive oil we know
customer_reviews.text: More than 15 years ago, we were at one of the best restaurants in our area, and they brought you artisanal bread and olive oil while you were waiting for your food. We liked the oil so much that we asked what the brand was. They told us. It took us a while to find a source, but we found it (we get it mail order). We have bought more than 100 cans of it since ... and that is still our olive oil for salads and bread-dipping.
customer_reviews.author: Francis de Regnaucourt

customer_reviews.title: You shorted me 0.5 L of Olive Oil.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two 1 L tins of olive oil. You sent me two 750 mL tins of organic olive oil. I'm not going to send it back, because we are completely out of olive oil, but I'm not happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not what you think
customer_reviews.text: Please do not buy this product based on the inaccurate reviews. This olive oil has none of the qualities of a high quality EVOO. It is yellow in color with a bitter taste. A high quality EVOO should be green in color with a fresh cut grass aroma and taste. The customers who have rated this five stars have not yet experienced a high quality EVOO. Unfortunately you will have to spend about $22-$30 for 16 oz. of high quality EVOO.
customer_reviews.author: mike nichols

customer_reviews.title: Delicious flavor of true olive oil
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best. I would buy again. Tired of olive oil where there is no deep rich flavor. This oil is rich and perfect.
customer_reviews.author: sungrass

customer_reviews.title: Best olive oil out there
customer_reviews.text: Great olive oil - our go to. Sad it isn’t available during the hoarding and the virus. Had to get some from the regular store!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Least expensive of the top-rated California brands. Has a slight peppery taste that some may not like but I love.
customer_reviews.author: Rick B.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: Love that this comes in a tin and can be protected from light. Packaged nicely so no dents or leakage.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tholen

customer_reviews.title: Great Container for Pouring!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this olive oil because it was the only option at the time on Amazon Pantry, but I actually really love it! You can't see it very well in the picture, but it has a small pop-put pour spout that makes it extremely easy to pour into an oil dispenser. The can is pretty large and lasts a long time, too!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby17

customer_reviews.title: quick to ship/good flavor
customer_reviews.text: first time using this brand and really like it for everyday use in cooking. Light nice flavor.
customer_reviews.author: amphibiac

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love the container that the olive oil is in. Would be nice to have a little vent so it can pour more easily. You would need to puncture a little hole on the top so it flows easier, but its not a huge deal. I use olive only for cooking and this makes it very handy to cook with.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Zoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the flavor. Real olive oil. And the container look is so nice as well. Will keep buying it. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value received
customer_reviews.text: I started using this when I noticed it being used by a very fine Italian restaurant in Northampton, MA. No reason not t o continuing to use it - it is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald R

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Oil
customer_reviews.text: Since the mafia oil scandal years ago, we've always been on the hunt for a good EVOO. We found it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: love this oil rich will use in special occasion over ...
customer_reviews.text: love this oil rich will use in special occasion over steam broccoli, in a risotto, a great salad. there is so much you can do with it. Not your typical olive oil. great buy.
customer_reviews.author: DaveC

customer_reviews.title: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time that I have ordered this product, and I'm a little disappointed in this olive oil. It is okay for cooking bu not good at all for dressings, dipping etc as it leaves a bitter aftertaste. Really wish that I had not purchased the double pack, That was a mistake.
customer_reviews.author: DeniseS

customer_reviews.title: Great, flavorful daily use oil
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite go too olive oil. Thankful Amazon carries it. Great for cooking & for a bread dip.
customer_reviews.author: .d.hogan

customer_reviews.title: Good Olive Oil
customer_reviews.text: This is a great olive oil for salads. It doesn't have the strongest flavor but it is better than most at this price point. You don't cook with this oil, use it on top of dishes. Overall, for the price this is better than the equivalents you will find at most grocery stores.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Lester

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying this olive oil for over 6 years. Love the flavor! Love that it comes n a tin container to keep it longer.
customer_reviews.author: Teetalow

customer_reviews.title: Good olive oil
customer_reviews.text: Good olive oil...messy container. It is a metal container, which is good, but the opening is one the top where there is a lip, and every time you go to pour you end up with olive oil everywhere...all down the sides of the container, and around top of the entire top....very messy.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon K. Root

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Lots of folks here seem to love this olive oil, but I'm not in love. The first thing to hit my tounge was bitterness, like from ground up pits. Then there was a flavorless smoothness, then a VERY peppery finish. There was no hint of green, grassy, herbiness at any point. The color is beautiful, tho a little pale; it will be fine for sautéing and cooking, but I could not use it fresh on a salad or for dipping bread.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla G

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting a really strong 'olive' taste with a beautiful green color
customer_reviews.text: This is decent. I was expecting a really strong 'olive' taste with a beautiful green color.. but was more yellow than green. I had high expectations because the ratings were really good.. I have to say it was a little bit of a let down. It's not bad, but i don't think i'd get it again.
customer_reviews.author: young mi cho

customer_reviews.title: A good tasting, all purpose olive oil
customer_reviews.text: I like the flavor. I have been using it in all my food cooking and am very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M. Vandyke

customer_reviews.title: like it
customer_reviews.text: It has already been received, but it has not been used yet. I believe it will taste good.
customer_reviews.author: young

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent quality
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this oil for the last few years, and have been very satisfied with the flavor and taste. It's been quite robust and of very good quality. However, the last 2 orders I received have been subpar - the taste was noticeably bitter. I'm surprised it passed quality control. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Z. N.

customer_reviews.title: Must have staple
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to olive oil. It is excellent and versatile. I usually buy in cans but this large bottle has been just as good. Only difference is that it is more vulnerable to light.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I only use ZOE
customer_reviews.text: I use this stuff constantly. Its all I cook with. Clean taste. Some might say expensive but one gets what one pays for. Since it goes into our food, which is good quality, why would I choose a low quality olive oil? I would not, which is why I use ZOE. Try it and I would be willing to bet, you are a ZOE convert!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hartsfield

customer_reviews.title: Best EVOO for the money on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Best EVOO for the price! Great for just about everything, has a delicious nutty aroma. Also for those who don't know this product DOES have a spout. You simply pull the ring on top and the plastic spout pulls out of the can.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Solid choice.  Can protects contents from UV.
customer_reviews.text: I use this oil routinely. Good stuff for a broad range of recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Maneki Neko

customer_reviews.title: Damn fine olive oil!
customer_reviews.text: This olive oil is outstanding. I could drink it out of the tin. It's great for cooking, and straight up for sopping bread up in, or for salads. The spout has to be pulled out - and who cares that a little olive oil gets on the tin due to a slightly poor design. Rub it into your hands, you'll feel fabulous for doing so.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: This olive oil is amazing! After reading so much about the lack of ...
customer_reviews.text: This olive oil is amazing! After reading so much about the lack of olive oil in many store brand olive oils I decided to do some research and stick with a certified brand. This brand makes all the difference!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality olive oil, especially for the price. We are very health conscious, as living with a clinical nutritionist can make you. The packaging keeps light and heat out so the oil stays fresh. We subscribe to this brand.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Rudman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great taste. Healthy. It's my new "Go To" oil for salads, waffles or anything of that sort.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better be a mechanic.
customer_reviews.text: No complaints about the quality. There was simply no way to remove cap. I ended up cutting it off, leaving a "spout" that dribbles terribly. Thoroughly disgusted.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Love the strong taste. Goes well with Fresh bread and different pasta recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Prateek

customer_reviews.title: Superior Quality & Excellent Taste at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: Before discovering this, I always Purch Spectrum Organic Olive Oil, Unrefined Extra Virgin, 25.4 Ounce for ~$24.99 (~$1.00/). This is equal in quality, 64oz (more than double the volume), and a lower price. Easy choice.
customer_reviews.author: M1

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend! Zoe is a steal for such great taste
customer_reviews.text: Since traveling to Italy, my husband has become picky with his olive oil. Zoe EVOO is the one brand that is consistently delicious and accessible in our remote area of the USA. Would highly recommend! Zoe is a steal for such great taste.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Heiney

customer_reviews.title: Repeat buyer. Like this Olive Oil Very Much!
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. The real deal. Good flavor, good smell. Stays fresh. Like the can.
customer_reviews.author: NiteShopping

customer_reviews.title: the cutest little tins of oil I've ever seen
customer_reviews.text: For some reason when I saw this on screen I thought it was the BIG tins I usually get at the specialty market - was surprised at the price and grabbed it fast. . .I can click fast when I need to hehe. When it arrived they were cute little tins. Taste and quality is superb and I prefer smaller tins - less air gets in over time (as I fill my cruet once a week). I may stick with this over the giant tin. Everything happens for a reason, right?
customer_reviews.author: dan stevens

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe packaging
customer_reviews.text: For years I have bought this product and loved it. Today I opened it and the entire plastic aparatus fell into the container. Waste of a full (not cheap) container of olive oil. Boo poor manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Gannon

customer_reviews.title: Best Olive Oil
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this oil from Amazon as well as in a local store. It is my absolute favourite olive oil. The chance to put it on a subscription is an added plus.
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful olive oil taste. Love the tins. Love the price. Some olive oil is sooooo over priced. And LOVE no GMO POISON OR SPRAY POISON.
customer_reviews.author: 5  stars

customer_reviews.title: Praying
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after watching and reading LOTS regarding olive oils. It is delicious. I hope it is real.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN W

customer_reviews.title: Best olive oil value + great flavor
customer_reviews.text: I use this olive oil for everything and I cook almost every day with it. Great value, great presentation, great quality. :)
customer_reviews.author: Ilan

customer_reviews.title: Sharp fresh buttery taste.
customer_reviews.text: I use this oil for cooking, for salads, also I use this oil to mix a small amount with body lotion as a hair tonic, And for dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: dohsho

customer_reviews.title: Good oil
customer_reviews.text: We like this oil, it tastes good and seems to be sold at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: The dispensing opening on this leaves something to be desired ...
customer_reviews.text: The dispensing opening on this leaves something to be desired. I use it to refill another olive oil bottle with a design that is easier to use for actual cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great oil, flawed packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I would give the oil, separate from the packaging, 4 stars. However, there is a problem with the packaging. The pouring spout, to put it bluntly, sucks. It is not possible to pour a small amount of oil without it running onto the edge of the can. It makes a mess and is wasteful. I wish the oil came with a better pouring spout.
customer_reviews.author: H. Israeli

customer_reviews.title: Scam. NOT 1 liter. They are 750 ml
customer_reviews.text: This is 2 @ 750 mls and why it doesn’t make sense on the math when you look at the 3 liter option. Assuming the 3 liter is actually 3 liters.. Fix the picture and the description and stop scamming people!!!
customer_reviews.author: General Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great peppery olive oil for dipping and cooking
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this olive oil for years, although we had to take a respite because it went off subscribe and save. It has a great peppery flavor that we just love for dipping and cooking. The tins are pretty enough to leave out too! We tried the Zoe organic olive oil as well. Although it is a good olive oil, the peppery nature of this olive oil keeps bringing us back.
customer_reviews.author: masterhankshake

customer_reviews.title: wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Instead of 2 one liter cans they sent me two 750 ml cans; just missed the return date by one day
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Clean, fresh taste
customer_reviews.text: Good clean flavor. at a good price. Cans are a little heavy so you have to be careful when pouring, but the oil has a pleasant taste even in salads or dipping for bread.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I use it for salad dressing and cooking....equally as good for both
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great and works well to cook with
customer_reviews.text: This is the second (maybe third?) time I have gotten this Olive Oil on amazon. I really enjoy it, and being able to get in a pantry order is great. It comes out to be cheaper than some of my local stores and is much easier than going out to get it! Tastes great and works well to cook with.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Taste Great
customer_reviews.text: I have tried almost every olive oil out there this one is in my top 3
customer_reviews.author: michael cavalieri

customer_reviews.title: I don't like that every time you pour oil out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that every time you pour oil out of the can you get oil all over the top of the can. It's difficult to clean off. I won't buy this product again, not because there's anything wrong with the oil, but because of the can it comes in.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

product_meta.title: ZOE Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 1 Liter Tin (Pack Of 2)
product_meta.description: Size:33.8 Fl Oz (Pack of 2)ZOE’s success over so many years has been quite simple. We offer the best quality ingredients and products available, and provide first class service and support to our clients, be they large or small. More importantly, we seek to establish strong long-term relationships. We remain committed to meeting the changing tastes of the consumer. Presently, we're actively satisfying our clients' growing social consciousness in the areas of preserving & protecting our environment, sustainability of natural resources, a healthy lifestyle, and personal development. Our efforts are dedicated to these discerning consumers: seeking and demanding products possessing authenticity of origin, truth in production, and sustainability of the environment. Our business has many facets. We are leading ingredient suppliers as well as proprietary brand owners. We have an established distribution network throughout the United States for the gourmet specialty food & foodservice/institutional trade, mass-market retailers, wholesale clubs, and private label.
feature_bullets: Aromatic bouquet: ZOE EVOO is a supple balance of fruit & Butter with an aromatic bouquet of fresh basil, Almond & Artichoke heart with a peppery finish. Fruity & rich, it's ideal for sauteing, salad dressing & pastas.

PORTUGUESE FLAVOR: New ZOE EVOO for 2020. Exclusively from Alentejo region in southern Portugal, possessing the ideal growing conditions of cool winters & warm summers to cultivate the olive fruit. A fresh blend of solely native olive varieties: Carrasquena, Arbequina, Arbosana, & Picual produce a parade of flavors to your palate of delicate fruit, luscious butter, & fresh herbs. Enjoy our latest addition to the ZOE family of the highest quality products.
The perfect ingredient: naturally paired with balsamic & Wine vinegars, marinades, basting, & sauteing. Zoe EVOO is a full bodied, versatile combination of fresh fruit & luscious butteriness.

Change your life: ZOE line of olive oils, vinegars, rice, tuna & sardinillas are made with uncompromising quality ingredients from Spain & Greece, enriching your meals with fresh extra virgin olive oil.

Top quality: ZOE brand conventional offers unmatched value With award-winning flavor, Authenticity & sustainability. Enjoy the finest quality of olive oils, vinegars, rice, tuna, & sardinillas from Spain, Portugal & Greece.
